#  Science for society -- Science for society 

URL: https://s4s.agh.edu.pl/en
Crawled: 2025-03-19 22:39:35

Science for society - a system of communication between scientific and economic entities Science4Society - is a project led by the AGH University of Science and Technology, whose main goal is to build a nationwide platform for cooperation between scientific units, institutes, and the wider business community.

metadata.title: Science for society -- Science for society
